rooms.description: A spacious entrance with Art Deco detailing, featuring geometric patterns and metallic accents.
A modern open plan living room adjoining the central courtyard, with vintage Art Deco finishes, comfortable seating, and ambient lighting.
Adjacent to the kitchen, featuring elegant Art Deco decor, built-in lighting fixtures, and a large dining table area.
A landscaped courtyard that acts as a focal point for natural light and ventilation, with ornamental water features and greenery following Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Comfortable guest bedroom with Art Deco influences, featuring elegant fixtures and ample storage space.
Spacious master bedroom with built-in wardrobes and an ensuite bathroom, decorated in a refined Art Deco style.
Two bedrooms for children, each designed with playful yet classic Art Deco elements ensuring safety and comfort.
